com.myronmarston.music.settings
Class VoiceSection

java.lang.Object
  com.myronmarston.music.settings.VoiceSection
All Implemented Interfaces:
Subscriber
public class VoiceSection
extends java.lang.Object
implements Subscriber

Represents the smallest unit of the fractal piece for which the user can specify settings. One of these exists for each combination of a Voice and a Section.

getUseDefaultSectionSettings

public boolean getUseDefaultSectionSettings()
Gets a value indicating whether or not this voice section will use the default section settings.

Returns:
true if the default settings will be used, false if the settings will be overriden

getSectionSettings

public SectionSettings getSectionSettings()
Gets the section settings for this voice section. If the useDefaultSectionSettings flag is set, a read-only copy of the section's settings will be returned. Otherwise, a local, editable copy will be returned.

Returns:
the section settings for this voice section

getVoiceSettings

public VoiceSettings getVoiceSettings()
Gets the voice settings for this voice voice. If the useDefaultVoiceSettings flag is set, a read-only copy of the voice's settings will be returned. Otherwise, a local, editable copy will be returned.

Returns:
the voice settings for this voice section

getRest

public boolean getRest()
Gets whether or not to make this VoiceSection one long rest. This overrides all other settings.

Returns:
whether or not to make this VoiceSection one long rest

setRest

public void setRest(boolean val)
Sets whether or not to make this VoiceSection one long rest. This overrides all other settings.

Parameters:
val - whether or not to make this VoiceSection one long rest

getVoiceSectionResult

public NoteList getVoiceSectionResult()
Gets the result of applying this VoiceSection's settings to the germ.

Returns:
a NoteList containing the result of applying the settings to the germ

saveVoiceSectionResultToMidiFile

public void saveVoiceSectionResultToMidiFile(java.lang.String fileName)
                                      throws java.io.IOException,
                                             GermIsEmptyException
Constructs a midi sequence using this voice section and saves it to a file.

Parameters:
fileName - the filename to use
Throws:
java.io.IOException - if there is a problem writing to the file
GermIsEmptyException - if the germ is empty

getLengthenedVoiceSectionResult

public NoteList getLengthenedVoiceSectionResult(Fraction length)
Returns the voice section result, set to a particular length by padding it with repeats and/or rests as appropriate.

Parameters:
length - the length to set the voice section to
Returns:
the voice section result, set to the given length

clearVoiceSectionResult

protected void clearVoiceSectionResult()
Sets the voiceSectionResult field to null. Should be called anytime a field that affects the voiceSectionResult changes.
